mods.abstract: Moyse writes to Gottlieb about how he and the other recruits are anxiously waiting to hear if they have received commissions. He also describes the training he is receiving in bayonet fighting and trench warfare, vowing to 'give Uncle Sam my best' wherever he may be sent.
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

titleInfo.title: Moyse-Gottlieb-Sommer Family Papers, Mss. 4671, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
Hermann Moyse, Sr. World War I Collection
